entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm.
